name: Fxsettings
tagline: FxSettings is JavaFX widget for editing settings in your app. It uses POJO as settings containers.
body:
### FxSettings widget
FxSettings is JavaFX widget for editing settings in your app. It uses POJO as settings containers.

### How to start
Just create model of your settings in simple POJO, annotate fields with @Settings and create FXSettings widget with root instance of your model. FXSettings also supports factories for creating lists. More information you can find in my blog([nesferatos.ru](nesferatos.ru))and in FXSettings project webpage ([fxsettings.nesferatos.ru](fxsettings.nesferatos.ru))

### Maven dependency
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>ru.nesferatos</groupId>
    <artifactId>fxsettings</artifactId>
    <version>0.1</version>
</dependency>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
